entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
